CustomField.description: An external ID for websites or integrations to access this Campaign. If left blank when the Campaign is created, a workflow rule automatically sets it to the 18-digit Salesforce ID.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set this to a custom external ID value for websites or integrations to match on. If left blank, it will be set to the 18-digit Salesforce ID.
CustomField.label: Campaign Reference ID
